movie.title: Deadpool 2
movie.writer: Rhett Reese, Paul Wernick, Ryan Reynolds
movie.actors: Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Morena Baccarin, Julian Dennison
movie.plot: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (AKA. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg, Cable.
